metadata.name: !Minimap API
metadata.description:
[h1]Minimap fully configurable, custom pickup icons, custom floor layouts, original fully replicated.[/h1]
[h1]Documentation[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1974981634/3195801972007490206/]Click here.[/url]
[h1]Features:[/h1] - A more dynamic minimap replaces the vanilla one. - Apply custom icons to rooms - Usable in all vanilla environments - This map has been [b]carefully created[/b] to match the functionality of the original. You'll never see something out of place! - A [b]fully fleshed out API[/b] that should have all the functions you'll ever need.
[h1]With this API: you can:[/h1] - Add or remove rooms from the minimap - Change player's position on the minimap - Display custom display flags and other RoomDescriptor data that you can control - Add custom pickup types that show up on the minimap - Add permanent room icons for you custom room types
[h1]Planned Features:[/h1] - Custom Room Shapes
[h1]Known Issues[/h1] (in order of which is likely to be fixed first) - Delirium's boss room shows its actual size instead of the fake 1x1 that the vanilla game shows
[h1]Want a different style of minimap?[/h1] Check out [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635]miniMAPI[/url] by Wofsauge.
If you see any bugs not listed here, comment below. [b]Last Updated 26th January 00:07 GMT[/b]
[b]If there are bugs in your version of Minimap API please make sure you have the most updated version. If you don't, unsubscribe and resubscribe to this mod and it SHOULD reinstall.[/b]
